entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
